name: PAB-1 Arms Violet
description:
Item Type: Light Armor
Damage Reduction: 20%
Temp. Rating: -37 / 67 °C
Clark Defense Systems built the PAB-1 light but strong enough to stay in a fight. The first CDS suit to utilize their proprietary nano-weave, this light armor became a favorite of those who needed a little extra protection while remaining agile.
description_cn:
物品类型：轻型装甲
伤害减免：20%
适用温度：-37 / 67 °C
卡拉克防御系统让PAB-1成为了虽然轻量，但是足够支撑战斗的装甲。第一件CDS利用其专有的纳米编织的轻型装甲，它成为那些只需要一点点额外的保护，但想保持灵活的人之选。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-特雷斯勒空间站-FPSArmor_Stanton4_LEO1
